tldr: The author discusses the challenges and opportunities of agriculture and food technology in the 1990s, focusing on the need to address surpluses, consumer demands, and environmental concerns. The Priorities Board for Research and Development in Agriculture and Food is introduced to advise on research and development priorities and allocate budgets effectively. The central objective of the agricultural industry is to provide food for consumers, while also improving the quality of raw materials and meeting the demands of the food industry.
